title: ++Fully Renovated Luxury 2 BR + Large Den/Office in Lincoln Square+ +
map_address: 4814 N Bell Avenue near Lawrence Avenue
posting_body: Lots of light in this beautiful, 2 bedroom + den/office luxury rehab, three blocks from Lincoln Square proper.
The warmth of this sunny second floor apartment makes it feel like home.
New granite and chrome designer bathroom with recessed lighting and linen cabinets.
Stunning new granite kitchen with washer, dryer, dishwasher, microwave, self-cleaning oven, 42" maple cabinets, under cabinet lighting, and pantry.
Working fireplace in living room.
Formal dining room with built-in hutch.
Large room-sized den/office.
Central air.
Beautiful hardwood floors and refinished woodwork throughout.
Ceiling fans in living room, kitchen, and bedrooms.
All rooms cable ready.
Walk-in closet in master bedroom.
Coat closet in hall.
All new insulated windows.
Large, enclosed back porch.
Yard privileges.
Close to Western Ravenswood CTA, Lawrence Ave.
Metra, Mariano's, CVS, Walgreens, Winnemac Park, and Lincoln Square restaurants, shopping, movies.
One garage space is included.
The address is 4814 N. Bell Ave.
